description: InnQuest Property Management System integration for hotel operations
explanation: This plugin provides integration with InnQuest PMS to manage hotel operations. It allows you to check room availability, retrieve guest details, update housekeeping status, and manage reservations. The plugin communicates with the InnQuest API using stored credentials.

inputDefinitions.name: tool_name
inputDefinitions.description: The name of the InnQuest tool to execute (e.g., check_room_availability, get_guest_details, update_room_status, get_housekeeping_status, get_reservation_list)

inputDefinitions.name: room_type
inputDefinitions.description: The type of room (e.g., 'King Suite', 'Standard Double') - used with check_room_availability

inputDefinitions.name: date
inputDefinitions.description: The date to check in YYYY-MM-DD format - used with check_room_availability

inputDefinitions.name: reservation_id
inputDefinitions.description: The unique ID for a reservation - used with get_guest_details

inputDefinitions.name: room_number
inputDefinitions.description: The room number - used with update_room_status

inputDefinitions.name: status
inputDefinitions.description: The new room status (e.g., 'Clean', 'Dirty', 'Needs Inspection') - used with update_room_status

inputDefinitions.name: check_in_date
inputDefinitions.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format for reservation range queries

inputDefinitions.name: check_out_date
inputDefinitions.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format for reservation range queries

inputGuidance: Specify the tool_name (or action) to indicate which operation to perform. Provide the relevant parameters based on the operation: use room_type and date for checking availability, reservation_id for guest details, room_number and status for updating room status, and check_in_date/check_out_date for listing reservations. The plugin will communicate with the InnQuest API using configured credentials.

outputDefinitions.name: name
outputDefinitions.description: The name of the tool that was executed

outputDefinitions.name: result
outputDefinitions.description: The actual result from the InnQuest API or error details
